title: Running with Rifles - Beta 0.94 Installation [Steam Release]
description:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Pick up your rifle and join the Green or Grey army in their mission to send the   enemy home in a box! RUNNING WITH RIFLES is an open world, top-down, tactical shooter for single player and multiplayer online, that puts you right in the middle of chaos in towns, trenches and forests turned into ruthless battlefields, controlling just one soldier in an army of several hundreds.

In a war where men die like flies and endless streams of reinforcements run to fill the void, it takes tactics and marksmanship to capture territories effectively. Change log: 0.94.1 update released

*online: connection timeout increased, enable connecting to a server with high lag
*mapview: defense marker is shown now when there are no more capturable bases (campaign koth maps)
*mapview: screen edge player markers are hidden now in mapview
*mapview: fixed mouse scroll skip bug
*mapview: local player position is highlighted with a mapview wide cross
*usability: field player markers now differ between local and remote players, slightly
*campaign: improved special character handling with usernames, '-character could cause unmatchable usernames causing extraction points not function
*campaign: fixed koth maps suffering from increased AI accuracy, making defensive enemies difficult to beat in single player
*campaign: sniper rifle XP requirement lowered
*campaign: ?-map extraction point removed
*matches: player-ai reduction functionality fixed
*classic: classic gamemode matches start with some RP, higher rank
*invasion: added option in script to disable completion based boosts and nerfs
*rewards: player kill RP rewards increased
*modding: /_test command added to quickly launch gamemode_tester.php in lobby
*modding: added overlay launch parameter, works same way as map parameter
